ch0363_00_asami/0101_0701_02_10:
Oh gosh, I can’t even keep track of all the
things we should do together!
ch0363_00_asami/7101_0701_01_10:
I looked up to Valerie so much, I kinda just
kept the momentum going and became her
apprentice.
ch0363_00_asami/7101_0701_02_10: But I’m glad I listened to my heart!
ch0363_00_asami/7101_0701_03_10:
Sometimes it’s important to go with the flow
and jump right in!
ch0363_00_asami/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you have anyone you really look up to,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0363_00_asami/7105_0701_02_10:
If you do, you should treasure that feeling
forever!
ch0363_00_asami/7105_0701_03_10: That admiration will help you shine, too!
ch0363_00_asami/1701_0701_01_10: I have something good for you! Here, take it!
ch0363_00_asami/1701_0702_01_10:
I was wondering who to give this to...
But I’m glad I chose you!
ch0363_00_asami/2501_0701_01_10:
Aside from me, Valerie has three other
apprentices.
ch0363_00_asami/2501_0701_02_10:
Everyone’s good at battling, and they’ve got
good taste in fashion, too! They’re amazing...
ch0363_00_asami/2501_0701_03_10:
I only joined because I admired Valerie and
figured I’d keep the momentum going,
so they shine much brighter than me!
ch0363_00_asami/2501_0702_01_10:
Right now, I may still be behind the other
three, trying to catch up...
ch0363_00_asami/2501_0702_02_10:
But one day, I’ll have Valerie’s seal of
approval! Just you wait!
ch0363_00_asami/3001_0701_01_10:
If you wanna achieve something, go for it!
Just keep that momentum going!
ch0363_00_asami/3003_0701_01_10:
Everything looks so delicious—I can’t decide
what to have for lunch.
ch0363_00_asami/3005_0701_01_10:
At night, I tend to think back on my day and
ask myself if I’m satisfied with it.
